snippet: Recent game releases range from a tropical vision quest to a dexterity challenge and an evocation of driving down an abandoned stretch of road.
abstract: Kotaku.com review of video games Far Cry 3, Hundreds, Joe Danger Touch, Kentucky Route Zero, Act 1 and Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward.
lead_paragraph: Recent game releases range from a tropical vision quest to a dexterity challenge and an evocation of driving down an abandoned stretch of road.

headline.seo: Far Cry 3, Hundreds, Zero Escape, Joe Danger Touch and Kentucky Route Zero
